### Tender Notice
===========================================

### Title
----------------

#### French
 English 
 Defense Technical Services for Vessel Extension - Research and Development

### Reference
-----------------

* PW-22-01013556

### Amendment
----------------

* Amendment number: 2
* Amendment date: 2022-12-07
* Description: This amendment extends the deadline for bid submissions to December 12, 2022, at 2:00 p.m. EST.

### Tender Description
------------------------

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) invites bids for the services of two Intermediate Consultants to provide Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS) for the Vessel Life Extension (VLE) program. The services will be required to ensure the maintenance and extension of vessels within the VLE program. The minimum qualifications for tenderers include Canadian citizenship, a bachelor's degree in engineering, 4+ years of experience in engineering, and advanced certification in multipurpose and ship life extension.

### Bidding Information
------------------------

* Bid solicitation number: 30002416
* Deadline for bid submissions: December 12, 2022 at 2:00 p.m. EST
* Evaluation criteria: formation, representational arrangements, credentials of the firm, importance of the issue service, fluidity of conditions.

### Important Dates
--------------------

* Publication date: 2022-11-15
* Tenders closing date: 2022-12-12T14:00:00
* Expected start contract date: None
* End contract date: None
* Tenders exceeded date: January 1 2023 (unsubscribe certificate closed 

### Specialized Services 
-----------------------------

* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canadian- Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.
